body:
Three times I tried to make a facecam video here's what happend.


First HG, rendered, watched the video, then the video just disapeard off the desktop right b4 my eyes.

Two, tried to play some HG with a freind, kept losing.

Three, tried Neubla and it was Ternio and I was like FUCK YEAH IM RECORDING and btw it was probably the best thing I've ever recorded, and my sister turns off the computer because she's an asshole.

Going to be a bit late on that promise.

FML
